meanings.definition: A small fried cake of sweetened dough.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat doughnuts for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a box of doughnuts for the office party.
meanings.sent3: The doughnuts at the bakery looked too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: The doughnuts in the display case called out to me like sugary sirens.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked doughnuts filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A ring-shaped cake made of sweetened dough.
meanings.sent1: My favorite doughnuts have chocolate frosting.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells a variety of doughnuts with different toppings.
meanings.sent3: The doughnuts at the party were disappearing faster than I could grab one.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and round as a freshly glazed doughnut.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sprinkles on the doughnuts made them look like edible confetti.
